de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.similarityfunction

Interface SimilarityFunction<O>

  • Type Parameters:
    O - object type
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ClusteringDistanceSimilarityFunction, DBIDSimilarityFunction, IndexBasedSimilarityFunction<O>, NormalizedPrimitiveSimilarityFunction<O>, NormalizedSimilarityFunction<O>, PrimitiveSimilarityFunction<O>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDBIDSimilarityFunction, AbstractIndexBasedSimilarityFunction, AbstractPrimitiveSimilarityFunction, AbstractVectorSimilarityFunction, ClusteringAdjustedRandIndexSimilarityFunction, ClusteringBCubedF1SimilarityFunction, ClusteringFowlkesMallowsSimilarityFunction, ClusteringRandIndexSimilarityFunction, ClusterIntersectionSimilarityFunction, ClusterJaccardSimilarityFunction, FractionalSharedNearestNeighborSimilarityFunction, HellingerDistanceFunction, InvertedDistanceSimilarityFunction, JaccardSimilarityDistanceFunction, Kulczynski1SimilarityFunction, Kulczynski2SimilarityFunction, LaplaceKernelFunction, LinearKernelFunction, PolynomialKernelFunction, RadialBasisFunctionKernelFunction, RationalQuadraticKernelFunction, SharedNearestNeighborSimilarityFunction, SigmoidKernelFunction

    public interface SimilarityFunction<O>
    Interface SimilarityFunction describes the requirements of any similarity function.
    Since:
    0.2
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
